skins.shipDescription: A-class destroyer C Acasta, Hull Number H09.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Acasta... part of the A-class. Calling me "brave" would be flattery. I was just doing my job... I'm not all that strong, but I'll do my best if you need me to.
skins.details: Is there something on my face?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hmm? Not very talkative...? *Yawn*... I guess it's because I'm always so sleepy...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Wha...? Guess I fell asleep. With weather this fine, I couldn't help it...
skins.secretaryIdle3: You don't talk much, just like me, Commander. How nice...
skins.secretaryTouch: Zzzzz... Ugh... I'm trying to sleep... don't poke me like that...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Uhh... if anyone sees us, you'll get arrested.

skins.shipDescription: Ardent told me I "gotta stop looking so tired" and I "gotta be more girly," so I did it while I was retrofitting... Do you recognise me, Commander? ... Umm, I'm Acasta, okay?
skins.acquisition: Ardent told me I "gotta stop looking so tired" and I "gotta be more girly," so I did it while I was retrofitting... Do you recognise me, Commander? ... Umm, I'm Acasta, okay?
skins.login: I just can't be bothered even after retrofitting...
skins.details: I'm dressing differently, but you're still just as nice to me... Thank goodness...
skins.secretaryIdle1: *Yawn*... Nobody'll see me yawning... if I cover it up with my turret... I think...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Zzz... Oh, shoot! I almost fell asleep... I hope the Commander didn't notice...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, do you wish I'd be even girlier than this...? Or am I fine the way I am now...?
skins.secretaryTouch: Ardent warned me about my sweetheart growing to dislike me if I'm too passive... Huh?! Commander? Jeez... I hope you didn't hear that...

skins.shipDescription: Hm? Guess we're both about to head out... Don't stare at me like that... Even I go outdoors sometimes... Since we're both, uh, headed the same way... maybe we could... walk there together?
skins.acquisition: Hm? Guess we're both about to head out... Don't stare at me like that... Even I go outdoors sometimes... Since we're both, uh, headed the same way... maybe we could... walk there together?
skins.details: Even I go on these "fashionable outings"... They do wear me out, though...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I always bring some weapons with me, in case I'm needed for a sudden sortie, I guess.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Recently, I've gotten a lot of compliments like "see, a little fashion could make you cute after all"... *Sigh*, it feels kinda odd, I guess...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, think I could take a nap if you're busy with that stuff...?
skins.secretaryTouch: *Sigh*... Maybe I should swap back to my old clothes...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Uhh... something might blow up if you poke me so casually.

skins.shipDescription: I heard you're supposed to hang lanterns up everywhere during the Spring Festival... so Ardent and I gave it a try! What do you think? Pretty cute, right? Um... I was talking about the lanterns...
skins.acquisition: I heard you're supposed to hang lanterns up everywhere during the Spring Festival... so Ardent and I gave it a try! What do you think? Pretty cute, right? Um... I was talking about the lanterns...
skins.details: It was no easy feat hanging up all these lanterns... Make sure to take it all in, okay...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: These red strips hanging from the lanterns? ...They're probably riddles of some sort? The Dragon Empery sure knows how to put on some interesting events...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Zzzz... Shoot, I dozed off... *sigh*... It's already this late...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I wonder if this outfit... brings out my girlish side...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, just hush and enjoy the lanterns. I'm totally... not dozing off...
